Articles.Content:
For those of you that have an understanding of Modding/programing.

First off, I am big fan of the new update. Lots of good stuff to keep me coming back in particular are the "place Satellite @ XXXX location". My question which might turn into a suggestion is, can you grade the accuracy of the orbit? For instance, I have to put a SAT in a Equatorial orbit at 15 Mm. If I am at 14.98, I still satisfy the contact but I think it would awesome if at the completion it gave you a percent on how accurate your overall placement was. And if that is possible maybe modifying the contractual reward off of accuracy. Thoughts?
That makes sense. But that might make it difficult to get the full reward.
